summary: This document is a chain of emails from 2021 between Jordy Feldman, the Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, and an FBI Special Agent in New York, with copies to Elena Vournas. The emails discuss a concerning claimant threatening bodily harm and seek general information from law enforcement to assist in evaluating claims for the program.

persons.name: Jordy Feldman
persons.role: Administrator of the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program
persons.context: The primary correspondent seeking to discuss the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program with law enforcement, forwarding concerning emails from a claimant.

persons.name: Elena Vournas
persons.context: Consistently copied on the email chain between Jordy Feldman and the FBI Special Agent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the perpetrator whose victims are the subject of the compensation program.

connections.description: Professional correspondence where Feldman, as Program Administrator, seeks information and advice from the FBI agent regarding the compensation program and a threatening claimant.
Vournas is consistently copied on Feldman's emails to the FBI, indicating a working relationship.
Feldman administers the compensation program established for victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Concerning Email from Claimant
events.description: Jordy Feldman receives and forwards another concerning email from a disgruntled claimant to the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program, which includes threats of bodily harm.

events.title: Scheduled Call Discussion
events.description: Jordy Feldman and the FBI Special Agent schedule a call for 4:00 PM to discuss the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

events.title: Initial Outreach to Law Enforcement
events.description: Jordy Feldman makes initial contact with an NYPD detective and is referred to an FBI Special Agent to discuss the Epstein Victims' Compensation Program.

locations: NYPD Detective Bureau Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force
keyFacts: Jordy Feldman was the Administrator of the independent Epstein Victims' Compensation Program (VCP) as of 2021.
The VCP Administrator received threatening communications from a disgruntled claimant, which were forwarded to the FBI.
The FBI Special Agent worked in the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit of the New York Field Office.
The document shows coordination between the victim compensation program and law enforcement (FBI and NYPD) regarding the Epstein case.
An NYPD detective from a Child Exploitation Task Force referred the VCP Administrator to a specific FBI Special Agent.
